cannot_load.message: Unable to load plugin from path "%s"; %s.

invalid_plugin_name.message: [%s] Invalid plugin name. The name must be comprised only of letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores.

invalid_privileged_property.message: [%s] Invalid "privileged" property: expected a boolean, got a %s.

invalid_hook.message: Unable to configure a hook for the event "%s": "%s" should be a plugin method name, or a function. %s

invalid_pipe.message: Unable to configure a pipe for the event "%s": "%s" should be a plugin method name, or a function. %s

privileged_not_supported.message: The plugin "%s" is configured to run in privileged mode, but it does not seem to support it.

privileged_not_set.message: The plugin "%s" needs to run in privileged mode to work, you have to explicitly set "privileged: true" in its configuration.

unavailable_realtime.message: The method "realtime:%s" is unavailable in plugins. Use a plugin hook instead.

failed_init.message: Something went wrong during initialization of "%s" plugin.

pipe_timeout.message: Plugin "%s": Timeout error. Pipe for event "%s" exceeded the timeout delay (%sms). Aborting.

unserializable_response.message: Unable to serialize response. Are you trying to return the request?

user_creation.message:
An error occurred during the creation of user "%s":
%s

unexpected_return_value.message: Unexpected return value from action "%s:%s": expected a Promise

unknown_connection.message: Unable to remove connection - unknown connection identifier: %s

errors_configuration_file.message: [%s] errors field in manifest.json badly formatted: %s

invalid_user_object.message: You must provide a valid User object when adding context with as().

invalid_callback.message: Invalid argument: Expected callback to be a function, received "%s".

missing_request.message: Invalid argument: a Request object must be supplied.

missing_request_data.message: A Request object and/or request data must be provided.

missing_authenticators.message: [%s] Strategy %s: dynamic strategy registration can only be done using an "authenticator" option (see https://tinyurl.com/y7boozbk).

invalid_description.message: %s expected the strategy description to be an object, got: %s.

invalid_methods.message: %s expected a "methods" property of type "object", got: %s.

invalid_method_type.message: %s expected a "%s" property of type "string", got: %s.

missing_method_function.message: %s the strategy method "%s" must point to an exposed function.

invalid_property_type.message: %s expected the "%s" property to be of type "string", got: %s.

invalid_config.message: %s expected a "config" property of type "object", got: %s.

unexpected_constructor.message: %s the "authenticator" and "constructor" parameters cannot both be set.

invalid_authenticator.message: %s expected an "authenticator" property of type "string", got: %s.

expected_object.message: %s expected the "%s" property to be of type "object", got: %s.

invalid_fields.message: %s expected the "fields" property to be of type "array", got: %s.

invalid_definition.message: %s the exposed "strategies" plugin property must be a non-empty object.

expected_promise.message: %s "%s" was expected to return a Promise, got: %s.

invalid_result.message: %s invalid authentication strategy result (expected an object).

invalid_kuid.message: %s invalid authentication kuid returned: expected a string, got a %s.

unknown_kuid.message: %s returned an unknown Kuzzle user identifier.

unauthorized_removal.message: Cannot remove strategy %s: owned by another plugin.

strategy_not_found.message: Cannot remove strategy %s: strategy does not exist.

invalid_description.message: %s Incorrect controller description type (expected object, got: "%s").

invalid_action.message: %s Action for \%s:%s" is not a function. %s

invalid_verb.message: %s Only the following http verbs are allowed: "%s". %s

invalid_authenticators.message: %s the exposed "authenticators" plugin property must be of type "object".

version_mismatch.message: [%s/manifest.json] Version mismatch: current Kuzzle version %s does not match the manifest requirements (%s).

invalid_name.message: [%s/manifest.json] Invalid "name" property: expected a non-empty string.
